#summary How to test the main features of DBJMIN

= Connecting Firebird =

 # *Type:* firebird
 # *Srv:* your_server
 # *Port:* 3050
 # *db:* your_database.fdb
 # *User:* database_user
 # *Passwd:* password

*_Example_

 # Type: <firebird>
 # Srv: <localhost>
 # Port: <3050>
 # db: <mydatabase.fdb>
 # User: <sysdba>
 # Passwd: <masterkey>

*`[` > `]`* (Click in the button for connect)

== Testing ==

   * CREATE

  {{{ 
  create table TBL_TEST 
   (
     ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
     DESCRIPTION CHAR(25),
     PRIMARY KEY (ID) 
   )
   }}}


  * INSERT

    {{{ insert into TBL_TEST(ID, DESCRIPTION) VALUES(1, 'Firebird Test' ) }}}


  * SELECT
    
    {{{ Select `*` from TBL_TEST }}}

  * BATCH UPADE

  * View Data
   
    Button [DATA] provides an easier way to select information, return for you all information within your table.

  * View Structure

    Button [Structure] provides an easier way to returns the table structure from Firebird.

  *_Example_*

  # Column Name: <ID>
  # Type Name: <LONG>
  # Length: <4>
